utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hi

utterance.speaker: All
utterance.content: Hey! Hi!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: How was the honeymoon?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: So, where's Mike?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, he's at the doctor, he didn't poop the whole time we were there!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well anyway, I'm glad you're back, I really need your help.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, why? What's up?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I have an audition for this play and for some of it I have to speak French. Which, according to my résumé, I'm fluent in.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Joey, you shouldn't lie on your résumé.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah, you really shouldn't. By the way, how was that year-long dig in Cairo?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: It was ok...

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I did not know you spoke French.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oui, bien sur je parle Fran?ais! Qu'est-ce que tu penses alors?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh... you're so sexy!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well, so, will you help me? I really wanna be in this play.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Sure! Tout le plaisir est pour moi, mon ami.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Seriously stop it, or I'm gonna jump on ya.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Why are you wearing my apron?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I'm making cookies for Erica. And oh, by the way, we have to leave for the airport soon, her plane comes in about an hour.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, hey, when she gets here, is it ok if I introduce you two as "my wife" and "the woman who's carrying my child"? No? Divorce?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You guys know where Rachel is?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No, we haven't seen her since this morning.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: So unbelievable. She was supposed to meet me half an hour ago with Emma.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: These are for Erica!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What? She's gonna eat all those cookies?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well, I want he baby to come out all cute and fat!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: So, why is Erica coming to visit?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well, because we want to get to know her better and she's never been to New York so she wants to see all the tourists' spots... you know, Statue of Liberty, Empire State Building...

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, those places! There's always so many people, they're being corralled like cattle, and... you know, there's always some idiot who goes "Mooooo"!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well, if it annoys you so much, then why do you do it?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, hi! Hi! Thanks for showing you up thirty minutes late!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ross...

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No, no, no, I'm sure you have a great excuse, wh-was it a hair appointment, a mani-pedi or was there a sale at Barney's?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: My father had an heart attack... ...while I was at Barney’s.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh my God.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Honey.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I'm so sorry...

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Is-is he ok?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, they said he's gonna be fine, but he's still heavily sedated.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Ok, ok. I'm gonna come out to Long Island with you, I mean, you can't be alone right now.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No, come on, I'm totally ok. I don't need you to come! I can totally handle this on my own.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Still-still, let me come... for me.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ok. If you really need to.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I bet someone could use one of Monica's freshly baked cookies.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, I really could.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ohh...

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: All right, it seems pretty simple. Your first line is "My name is Claude", so, just repeat after me. "Je m'appelle Claude".

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Je de coup Clow.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well, just... let's try it again.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Ok.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Je m'appelle Claude.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Je depli mblue.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Uh. It's not... quite what I'm saying.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Really? It sounds exactly the same to me.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: It does, really?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: All right, let just try it again. Really listen.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Got it.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Je m'appelle Claude.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Je te flouppe Fli.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, mon Dieu!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, de fuff!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey you guys.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I want you to meet someone really special. Phoebe, this is Erica. And this is the baby!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Joey. Erica, baby!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hi.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Everyone. Erica, baby!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Monica. Calm, self.

utterance.speaker: Erica
utterance.content: Thank you. It's really nice to meet you guys, I can't believe I'm here!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Welcome to New York City! Or should I say "ghe deu flooff New York City"?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Why would you say that?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ok. What are you gonna be doing today?

utterance.speaker: Erica
utterance.content: I wanna see everything! Times Square, Coney Island, Rockefeller Center...

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, you know what you should do? You should walk all the way at the top of Statue of Liberty.

utterance.speaker: Erica
utterance.content: Oh yeah, let's do that!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Great! This baby'd better be really good.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, uhm, excuse me, I'm here to see my father. My name is Rachel Green.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: And I'm Doctor Ross Geller.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ross, please, this is a hospital, ok? That actually means something here.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Can somebody please go in?

utterance.speaker: Nurse
utterance.content: Absolutely.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Rach, I think I'm gonna wait out here, because my throat is feeling a little scratchy, I don't want to infect him.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ross, please, don't be so scared of him!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I'm not scared of him, I'm really sick!

utterance.speaker: Nurse
utterance.content: He's under sedation, so he's pretty much out.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I'm feeling better.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh! Oh! Oh my God! Ohhh, ohhh, wow, that ear and nose hair trimmer I got him was just money down the drain, huh?

utterance.speaker: Nurse
utterance.content: Miss Green, your father's doctor is on the phone if you'd like to speak to him.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, great, Are you gonna be ok?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: He's unconscious, I think we'll be just fine!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Did the TV wake you?

utterance.speaker: Dr. Green
utterance.content: No, when you put your feet up in my bed, you tugged on my catheter.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Ouchy.

utterance.speaker: Dr. Green
utterance.content: What are you doing here, Geller?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well, I came with Rachel, who should be back any second! So what's new?

utterance.speaker: Dr. Green
utterance.content: Ooh, I have a little heart attack.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Right, is it painful?

utterance.speaker: Dr. Green
utterance.content: What, the heart attack or sitting here talking to you?

utterance.speaker: Dr. Green
utterance.content: So what's new with you, uh, knocked up any more of my daughters lately?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Nope, just the one. RACH!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Je m'appelle Claude.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Je do call blue!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Noooo! Ok, maybe if we just break it down. Ok, let's try at one syllable at a time. Ok? So repeat after me. "je".

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: je.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: m'ap

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: mah

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: pelle

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: pel.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Great, ok faster! "je"

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: je.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: m'ap

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: mah

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: pelle

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: pel.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Je m'appelle!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Me pooh pooh!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ok, it's too hard, I can't teach you!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What are you doing?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I, I have to go before I put your head through a wall.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Don't move! Don't go! I need you! My audition is tomorrow! Shah blue blah! Me lah peeh! Ombrah! . Pooh.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I w!s gonna make us some dinner but all I found in your dad's fridge was bacon and heavy cream. I think we solved the mystery of the heart attack.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Uh. Did you call your parents?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, yeah. Emma's doing great.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh good.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Wow.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Just can't believe I'm in Rachel Green's room.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What do you mean? You've been in my room before!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah, sure, right! Like I've ever been in Rachel Green's room.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ok I gotta tell ya, it's really weird when you use my whole name.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Sorry. . You ok?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You had a rough day, uh?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, just so weird seeing him like that, you know? I mean he is a doctor, you don't expect doctors to get sick!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: But we do! It's gonna be ok, Rach!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ow. I don't want him to wake up alone! I should go to the hospital!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What? No, no! Hey, hey, hey look...

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: They gave him a lot of medication, ok? He wouldn't even know if you were there. Look, we'll go see him first thing in the morning, ok?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Really, I shouldn't feel guilty?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No, God! Hey, Rach, you've been an amazing daughter, ok? Right now you just need to get some rest.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ok, maybe you're right.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Good night.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Wait, wait, wait, wait. Would you stay here with me for a little while?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Sure!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ok. Thank you for coming with me today.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, of course...

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Rachel Green is very happy you're in her room!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Me too. Come here.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I just don't want to be alone tonight.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Ok, well, uh, I can maybe grab a sleeping bag, or... Oh, oh. . No, Rach! I'm sorry, I just don't think this, this, this is a good idea.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Wait, we won't know that until we do it, will we?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No, look, uh. You are upset about your father and you're feeling vulnerable and I just don't feel it would be right, I'd feel like I'd be, you know, taking advantage of you.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Taking advantage? I'm giving you the advantage, enjoy!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Look, I'm sure it would be great, but I-I think one of us has to be thinking clearly, so, I'm gonna go!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Wow. Ok.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I'll see you in the morning .

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Mhm-mh!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Haven't had sex in four months, I should get a medal for that!

utterance.speaker: Erica
utterance.content: Thanks so much for taking me to all those places. I had a great time.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, I'm glad. Listen, I want to apologize about Chandler, though. I just did not see this coming.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: New York is awesome!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What is with you?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, I've been to these places before, but I've never really seen them, you know.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah, you miss alot, when you're moo-ing.

utterance.speaker: Erica
utterance.content: Thanks so much for showing me around.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh! It was our pleasure. We are so much enjoying getting to know you.

utterance.speaker: Erica
utterance.content: Well, if there is anything else you wanna know...

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, uhm, okay, uhm, do you mind if we ask you some questions about the father?

utterance.speaker: Erica
utterance.content: Oh, sure. Yeah, well, he was my high school boyfriend. Captain of the football team, really cute and he got a scholarship and went off to college.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: That's great.

utterance.speaker: Erica
utterance.content: Yeah... it's almost definitely him.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: How's that now?

utterance.speaker: Erica
utterance.content: Well, there is a chance it's another guy. I mean, I have only ever been with two guys, but they sorta overlapped.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: So, what does the other guy do? Does he go to college too?

utterance.speaker: Erica
utterance.content: No, he's in prison.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Was he falsely accused of something?

utterance.speaker: Erica
utterance.content: No... he killed his father with a shovel. But other than that, he's a great guy.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I'll bet his dad doesn't think so.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Are you awake?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Of course I'm awake. Assume from now on that I'm always awake!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Alright, we don't know that it's him. I mean, it could be the football guy.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Honey, it's us. Of course it's the shovel-killer.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Alright, lets say that it is him, would we not want the baby? No! Would we treat him any differently?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I'd keep an eye on him! We have to find out which one the father is.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: How?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I dunno, aren't there tests for these things, right?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah, but maybe we're just over-reacting.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Pff, easy for you to say, he's a father killer. He probably loves him mommy. He's probably got a tattoo that says "mom" on his shovel-wielding arm!

utterance.speaker: Tape
utterance.content: We will now count from one to five. Un, deux, trois, quatre, cinq.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Huh, un, blu, bla, flu, flenk!

utterance.speaker: Tape
utterance.content: Good job.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Thank you.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey Joey.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Listen, I feel really badly about yesterday and I thought about it a lot and, and I know, I was too impatient. SO lets try it again.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, no, that's okay, I don't need your help. I worked on it myself and I gotta say, I am pretty good!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Really, can I hear some of it.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Sure, sure. Ok, "Bleu de la bleu, de la blu bla bleu" See?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well, you're not, You're not... you're not... again, you're not SPEAKING FRENCH!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh well I think I am, yeah and I think I'm definitely gonna get the part.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: How could you possibly think that?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: For one thing, the guy on the tape said I was doing a good job!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey Rach, can you grab me a cup of coffee?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Sure.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You've been quiet all morning. Is everything okay?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hmm-hmm.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You sure you're alright?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yep.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: O-kay. Well, I'm gonna go grab us some breakfast.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: FYI..

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: There it is...

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: In the future, when a girl asks for some ill-advised sympathy sex... just do it.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Wait, wait, You're mad at me about last night? I was just trying to do the right thing.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Really? Well, it seems to me if you'd done the right thing, I would not have woken up today feeling stupid and embarrassed, I would have woken up feeling comforted and satisfied!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well...

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh stop that!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I can't believe this. I was just being a good guy. I treated you with respect and understanding.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, that is so hot.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey, I was looking out for you.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, really, well Ross, you know what? I am a big girl. I don't need someone telling me what is best for me.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I gotta say, I have not had sex a lot of times before, this is the worst ever.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, really, really? Well, it wasn't very good for me either.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey you know what? You know what? To avoid this little thing in the future, let's just say, you and me, never having sex again.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: That's right, sex is off the table. I am never having sex with you again. Dr. Green, are you feeling better?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey! How was lunch?

utterance.speaker: Erica
utterance.content: We had a good time. By the way, I wanted to ask you something. It would really mean a lot to me, if the baby was a boy, that you name him after my father, Jiminy Billy Bob

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, really?

utterance.speaker: Erica
utterance.content: No! You we're right, that was fun! I'm gonna go finish packing.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: O-okay. So, is she gonna take the test?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Nope, she doesn't have to, I found out who the father is.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh God. It's shovely-Joe, isn't it?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No it's not.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: How do you know?

utterance.speaker: Erica
utterance.content: Well, it turns out that Erica didn't pay much attention in Sex Ed class, because the thing she did with that prison guy... it'd be pretty hard to make a baby that way.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh God! What was it? The thing that we hardly ever do or the thing we never do?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: The thing we never do.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Shovely Joe!

utterance.speaker: Director
utterance.content: Whenever you're ready Joey.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Right. Dja bu bu Claude. Uh, c'est la pu les la lu blah bloo.

utterance.speaker: Casting assistant
utterance.content: I'm sorry, what's going on?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Dude, come on! French it u-up!

utterance.speaker: Director
utterance.content: Joey, do you speak French?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Toutes la smore! Bu blu-ay bloo blah ooh! Pfoof!

utterance.speaker: Director
utterance.content: You know what. I think this audition is over.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Uh, excuse me. Uh, I am Reginé Philange. I was passing by when I heard this man speaking the regional dialect of my French town of Estée Lauder.

utterance.speaker: Director
utterance.content: You really think this man is speaking French?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Sa-sa-saw!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: écoutez, je vais vous dire la vérité. C'est mon petit frère. Il est un peu retardé.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Alors, si vous pouviez jouer le jeu avec lui...

utterance.speaker: Director
utterance.content: Good job, little buddy. That was some really good French. But I think we're gonna go with someone else for the part.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Ah. All right. But my French was good?

utterance.speaker: Director
utterance.content: It was great.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh-hoh! Ha-hah! See!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Merci. Au revoir.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah-hah. Toute-de-le-fruit.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Emma's down for the night.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, good.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: So uh... I guess I wanna take off.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay... Hey listen, just before you go I-I again, I just wanna say "thank you" for coming with me.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, no problem.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: And also, you know I uh, I was thinking about what you said, you know, about the whole sex thing and... it's probably not a great idea to go down that road again.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Thank you. I'm glad you agree.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: It's a shame though, I mean, when we did it, it was pretty good.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah... Yeah, that's true.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey uhm, do you remember that one really great time...?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, ye-ah!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: You know it was you're uhm... birthday...

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: ...Valentine's day...

utterance.speaker: Both
utterance.content: Oh yeah!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, I guess that's all in the past, now.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hmmm-mmmm.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Not even one more time?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Not even once.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No matter how much we want it.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Even if we want it really bad.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: That's what we decided.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Uhm, right!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: ...It's kinda hard though!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: You know, when two people have a connection, you know, that's... just seems like such a... waste.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: ...I hate waste.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: ...Ross?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yes?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Just so you know... With us... it's never off the table.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Damn it. It's never off the table.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay, can you really tapdance?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: It's off the resumé.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Archery?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Horseback riding?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Would fall off a lot.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: You can drink a gallon of milk in 10 seconds?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: That I can do.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Come on! You can drink a gallon of milk in 10 seconds?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Al, right, watch me! Okay, you time me. Ready?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ready... GO!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: You did it!
